DOC.brief_title: Fast Track Hip Fracture - Optimized Pathway Hip Fracture Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The Norwegian hip fracture register prospectively collect data hip fracture patient include , among others , time surgery , type fracture , type surgery American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) score . The register also collect quality life data 4 12 month surgery . Using unique Norwegian personal identification number data Norwegian hip fracture register connect data electronic patient record Akershus University hospital ( AHUS ) . Fast track surgery hip fracture patient introduce end 2013 . Mortality quality life data compare hip fracture patient operate AHUS two year two year change standard care . The combined data register electronic patient record use regression analysis .
DOC.criteria: Operated Akershus university hospital hip fracture ( neck femur , trochanteric , subtrochanteric ) 2012 , 2013 , 2014 2015 18 year old stress fracture
